phrs.translation: 鬼神学, 恶魔学, 恶魔学识

sentences.sentence: Large multinational companies are the chief villains in the demonology of contemporary anticapitalists.
sentences.translation: 大型跨国公司是当代反资本主义者鬼魔信仰中的首恶。
术士：痛苦，恶魔学识，毁灭。

sentences.sentence: Molten Core: This talent has been moved to Demonology (tier-8).
sentences.translation: 熔火之心：此天赋已移至魔鬼(三层- 8)。
